feature.name: Sacred Oath: Oath of the Heart (HB)
feature.text:
This paladin has a deep connection to their heart and the collective heart in the multiverse. Everything they do comes from a place of love. These paladins are romantics, seeing beauty in everything. They feel their emotions intensely and act to make the world a better place.
Oath Spells: You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed.
Oath of the Heart Spells: 3rd | detect evil and good, protection from good and evil 5th | detect thoughts, zone of truth 9th | beacon of hope, dispel magic 13th | crusader's mantle, guardian of faith 17th | awaken, dispel evil and good
Source: Monsters of the City: Sins & Virtues p. 136

feature.name: Oath of the Heart (HB): Channel Divinity: Heart Sense
feature.text:
The paladin can sense if evil creatures or evil magic is within 60 ft.
Source: Monsters of the City: Sins & Virtues p. 136

feature.name: Oath of the Heart (HB): Channel Divinity: Call of the Heart
feature.text:
The paladin calls out and any evil creature within 30 ft. must make a successful Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on their next attack.
Source: Monsters of the City: Sins & Virtues p. 136

feature.name: Oath of the Heart (HB): Know Alignment
feature.text:
The paladin knows the alignment of any creature within 30 ft.
Source: Monsters of the City: Sins & Virtues p. 136

feature.name: Oath of the Heart (HB): Aura of the Heart
feature.text:
Any ally within 10 ft. of the paladin is resistant to necrotic and poison damage.
Source: Monsters of the City: Sins & Virtues p. 136

feature.name: Oath of the Heart (HB): Guided by the Heart
feature.text:
Whenever the paladin makes a critical hit, waves of love are sent out to its allies within 30 ft. Each ally is healed for 1d6 hit points.
Source: Monsters of the City: Sins & Virtues p. 136

feature.name: Oath of the Heart (HB): Holy Horse
feature.text:
A loyal pegasus steed is sent from the divine to serve the paladin. If it's destroyed a new one arrives at dawn.
Source: Monsters of the City: Sins & Virtues p. 136

feature.name: Oath of the Heart (HB): Enduring Love (Oath of the Heart (HB))
feature.text:
Any fallen allies within 30 ft. of the paladin are immediately stabilized.
Source: Monsters of the City: Sins & Virtues p. 136
